These credentials do not match our recor: Bad pass! These stats are not in our roster.
Too many login attempts. Please try agai: Too many personal fouls! Take a break on the bench for :seconds seconds.
SLAM DUNK! Your password has been successfully changed.
We have emailed your password reset link: ASSIST! We have sent the password reset link to your email.
Time-out! Please try again in a moment.
Traveling! This link has expired or is invalid.
We can't find a user with that email add: Air ball! No player with this email is in our league.
Please confirm access to your account by: Show your team card! Enter the 6-digit authentication code from your app.
Stay on the bench! Enter one of your emergency recovery codes.
Bad pass! This code doesn't match, try again.
Traveling! This recovery code is not in our strategy.
Trenér právě kreslí vítěznou taktiku pro: The coach is drawing up the winning strategy for our new website.
Vzali jsme si oddechový čas, abychom do: We've taken a time-out to pack our new website with all the dunks and three-pointers you deserve. Give us a moment on the bench, we'll be back in the game with a full roster soon!
Straight from the court to the tactical board.
Sign in and the arena is yours.
Stává se i nejlepším střelcům. Pošleme p: It happens even to the best shooters. We'll send a pass for a new start.
Resetujte si nastavení a naskočte zpět d: Reset your settings and jump back into the game.
Ještě jeden krok před výkopem. Potvrďte: One more step before tip-off. Confirm your email.
Staň se součástí týmu a vyběhni na palub: Join the team and take the court.
Otevřete Google Authenticator nebo podob: Open Google Authenticator or a similar app.
Nainstalujte si Google Authenticator, Mi: Install Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator or a similar app from App Store or Google Play.
V aplikaci zvolte \"Přidat účet\" a nask: In the app, choose "Add account" and scan the code you see on the screen.
Aplikace začne generovat 6místné kódy. T: The app will start generating 6-digit codes. Enter the current one into the box and confirm.
Po úspěšném potvrzení se vám zobrazí sez: After successful confirmation, a list of recovery codes will be displayed. Save them carefully in case you lose your phone.
Jako člen realizačního týmu máš přístup: As a member of the management team, you have access to the entire club's tactics. We must defend your account like a basket in the last second.
Naskenuj tenhle kód do své aplikace, ať: Scan this code into your app so we are on the same team.
Zadejte 6místný kód z aplikace: Enter the 6-digit code from the app
Obrana je postavená! Dvoufázové ověření: Defense is set! 2FA has been successfully activated. Below are your recovery codes.
Kódy použij v případě, že ztratíš přístu: Use codes if you lose access to your phone. Without them, you won't get into the locker room.
V případě ztráty přístupu může váš účet: In case of lost access, another administrator can reset your account in the user management section.
email_reset_subject: [Kbelští sokoli] Pass for a new password
email_reset_body: We got word that you need a new password. No problem, just click the button below and get back in the game.
email_reset_footer: If you didn't request a change, you can leave this message on the bench.
email_verify_body: One more step before tip-off. To make sure it's you, please confirm your email by clicking the button below.
footer.brand_text: Website for Men C and Men E teams within TJ Sokol Kbely Basketball.
footer.brand_subtext: Information about teams, matches, events, and member section – with links to the wider Kbely basketball community and youth recruitment.
footer.club_text: Looking for basketball for kids or youth? Continue to the main Kbely basketball website.
footer.contact_placeholder_text: Contact us via the contact page.
footer.contact_club_info: For general club information, visit the main club website.
footer.bottom_part_of: Part of TJ Sokol Kbely Basketball
